plot: Charles Trenet sings three of his hit songs "La polka du roi", "Le grand café" and "Je chante".
title: Trois chansons, trois époques
plot_es: Charles Trenet sings three of his hit songs "La polka du roi", "Le grand café" and "Je chante".
plot_en: Charles Trenet sings three of his hit songs "La polka du roi", "Le grand café" and "Je chante".

cast.role: Himself /              Lui-même - chantant trois de ses chansons
cast.name: Charles Trenet
